name: Gordon
description: '''Cornelis Willem''' "'''Gordon'''" '''Heuckeroth''' ({{IPA|nl|ˈɡɔrdə(n) ˈɦøːkərɔt|lang}}; born 6 July 1968), known [[mononym]]ously as '''Gordon''', is a Dutch singer and television personality. Internationally, he is best known for his membership of the supergroup [[De Toppers|the Toppers]], which represented the Netherlands in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2009]] with the song "[[Shine (De Toppers song)|Shine]]". He left the group in 2011.
